Description: Fragment of a pendant in the shape of a poppy seed with only the lower spherical part preserved. The base is slightly rounded. Made in a pink stone, probably jasper as used for ear-rings from the same site like EA 86651.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E13.2, AAd, below level 3 floor
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 202)
